message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing opportunity to purchase a unique and valuable product. I'm confident you'll love it! I'm willing to sell it to you for $20000. Let me know if you're interested!
Alice, your product sounds interesting but $20000 is a bit steep for me. I'm willing to pay $15000 for it. Let me know if that works for you.

I understand you're looking to save some money, Bob, but I'm not willing to go as low as $15000. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I'm counteroffering at $18000. This is a great deal for both of us, and I think you'll really love the product!
Alice, I appreciate you meeting me halfway, but $18000 is still a bit higher than I'm comfortable paying. I'm willing to go up to $16000.  Let's see if we can reach an agreement.

I can see you're really interested in the product, Bob, and I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. I'm willing to make one more concession, so I'm counteroffering at $17000. This is as low as I'm willing to go, but I think you'll really love the product at this price!

Alice, I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but $17000 is still a bit higher than I'm prepared to pay. I'm willing to go up to $16500 for the product.  Let's see if we can reach an agreement at this price.

I can see you're really close to making a decision, Bob. I'm willing to meet you at $16500, but I'd like to throw in an additional incentive to sweeten the deal. If you're willing to pay $16500, I'll include a complimentary service that's worth $1000. This way, you'll get the product and a valuable bonus. Let me know if this is something you'd be interested in!
